Barreling Swing.name: Barreling Swing
Barreling Swing.flavor: You rush through your foes, swinging your weapon in sweeping arcs as you arrive in their midst.
Barreling Swing.effect: You charge and make the following attack in place of a melee basic attack. When charging, you can move through enemies’ squares.
Barreling Swing.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Barreling Swing.weapon: If you’re wielding a two-handed mace or a two-handed hammer, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Brutal Fury.name: Brutal Fury
Brutal Fury.flavor: Seeing one enemy fall before your might stokes your bloodlust.
Brutal Fury.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points
Brutal Fury.effect: You charge and make the following attack in place of a melee basic attack.

Tumbling Trample.name: Tumbling Trample
Tumbling Trample.flavor: You muscle aside enemies that stand between you and your chosen foe.
Tumbling Trample.trigger: You move out of a square occupied by an enemy
Tumbling Trample.effect: You push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
